name: A Better Mouse Trap
storyline: Elandra has invented a better mouse trap, while Davy Jones wanted to enhance it. It teleports both to the distant planet, where Elandra and Davy are separated. Walking around the planet, talking to inhabitants, and collecting the items, the player should help Elandra and Davy to get united and to return back to Reality-on-the-Norm in this classic point-n-click icon-based adventure game. Davy and Elandra are controlled by the player in non-cooperative way.
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Dave Gilbert as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.
